*** Bug 160054 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Sorry, I missed the bad array size in my code and managed to somehow test only on workspaces that wouldn't hit this scenario. That was my first mistake...

Mistake #2, PMC review missed catching it.

Mistake #3, I listened to the PMC ;-) when they had an issue with my try/catch block and I narrowed it, exposing the new exception.

I've fixed the problem and released to 1.5.2 and 2.0 streams.

For the records, the problem was only hit when you create a EJB project with no EJB inside of the module. If you only had a web project, as we typically do for the smoke test you will not see this problem. I will watch to improve the scenario for the smoke test
